item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Watching o3 guess a photo's location is surreal, dystopian and entertaining (205 points | 143 comments)
2. Show HN: My self-written hobby OS is finally running on my vintage IBM ThinkPad (92 points | 16 comments)
3. An end to all this prostate trouble? (283 points | 129 comments)
4. LLMs can see and hear without any training (85 points | 23 comments)

6. Stuffed-Na(a)N: stuff your NaNs (32 points | 23 comments)

8. Australian who ordered radioactive materials walks away from court (139 points | 148 comments)
9. The Friendship Recession: The Lost Art of Connecting (220 points | 142 comments)
10. I wrote a book called "Crap Towns". It seemed funny at the time (322 points | 231 comments)
11. ICE Deports 3 U.S. Citizen Children Held Incommunicado Prior to the Deportation (365 points | 242 comments)
12. Berkeley Humanoid Lite – Open-source robot (212 points | 20 comments)
13. Will the Humanities Survive Artificial Intelligence? (23 points | 29 comments)
14. Freshpaint (YC S19) is hiring back end and front end engineers (Remote, US only) ( | hide)
15. Writing "/etc/hosts" breaks the Substack editor (594 points | 320 comments)
16. Lossless LLM compression for efficient GPU inference via dynamic-length float (378 points | 109 comments)
17. Fifteen new giant radio galaxies discovered with ASKAP (11 points | 1 comment)

19. The NNCPNET Email Network (11 points | 3 comments)
20. Mobygratis – Free Moby music to empower your creative projects (93 points | 21 comments)
21. World Emulation via Neural Network (215 points | 37 comments)
22. Parallel ./configure (161 points | 126 comments)
23. The True Size Of (5 points | discuss)
24. Catastrophic fires and soil degradation: possible link with Neolithic revolution (6 points | 1 comment)
25. Reproducibility project fails to validate dozens of biomedical studies (239 points | 112 comments)
26. Show HN: I used OpenAI's new image API for a personalized coloring book service (268 points | 146 comments)
27. Eurorack Knob Idea (298 points | 108 comments)
28. Show HN: Formalizing Principia Mathematica using Lean (161 points | 31 comments)
29. Your phone isn't secretly listening to you, but the truth is more disturbing (110 points | 87 comments)
30. Backblaze: Mounting Losses, Lawsuits, Sham Accounting, Insider Selling (137 points | 71 comments)
